headline: Could ADM’s (ADM) Carbon-Negative Push Signal a Deeper Shift in Its Growth Priorities?
summary: OCOchem recently announced a production partnership agreement with Archer-Daniels-Midland to build a field demonstration plant at ADM’s Decatur, Illinois corn processing complex, using OCOchem’s Carbon FluX Electrolyzer technology to convert biogenic CO2 from ADM’s ethanol output into formate molecules for use in various industrial and consumer applications. This initiative marks a step toward scaling carbon-negative chemicals and diversifying ADM’s product lineup, supporting lower-carbon...
